reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and trendy, with one noting it feels and looks expensive. Moreover, the dress is well-made, true to size, and perfect for homecoming events. Additionally, they appreciate its length, with the back being longer than the front, and the material being nice and thick. Customers also find it comfortable. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels and looks expensive
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous dress! Feels and looks expensive. Very nice quality. Note: Amazon told me my recommended size was L but the size guide put me more as an M. So I ordered two dresses; one in each size. The M fit perfectly. The L was just a little bit too large in the chest/shoulder area. The top half of this dress (the part with the sequins) is STRETCHY. For reference, I’m 5’7” and 140 lbs. The navy color is beautiful, but the green color (the one I’m returning) is also stunning. Read more
items.author: Biker Chick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!!
items.body: Was for my daughters 8th grade graduation she loved it. It was beautiful. Very good quality, true to size. I bought it a little bigger so she could ware it more. She's in 10th grade now and its still super comfortable for her!! Read more
items.author: Samantha Hernandez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for homecoming!!
items.body: We're really impressed with the quality of this dress!! Our daughter is 135 lbs, 5' 7 and wearing a size small, and it fit like a glove!! The green is absolutely beautiful! There is no stretch to the fabric, but it fits true to size. Would definitely buy this dress again! Read more
items.author: AlaskaMama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy, dazzling, well made dress for homecoming or special occasion.
items.body: A gorgeous, sparkling and classy, age-appropriate homecoming dress. After much searching at area stores, we were getting disappointed with the super skimpy low-cut corset top styles. We were pleasantly surprised to find this dress on Amazon and it is beautiful. So many compliments. Age-appropriate and classy style. Size chart was accurate. Lots of sparkle and shine. Well made and not see through. Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!
items.body: This dress is very pretty. It fit my daughter pretty well (size 14). The overall quality was pretty good except the zipper was a bit on the cheap side. But for a one night wear, it was perfect. I loved the varying length of the dress how it is flared and longer in the back. Read more
items.author: TechGirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, versatile dress
items.body: Wow. This dress absolutely killed it. I bought it to wear to my birthday dinner on a cruise by a Michelin star rated chef, and it did not disappoint! It's a great "eatin' dress" as we say here in the South. Super comfortable, you can wear a regular bra with it, and the price honestly isn't that bad considering the quality. I'll definitely wear it for other occasions! Also, pro tip. Steam the bottom layers of the dress before wearing. It takes a while, but looks so much better. The material is nice and thick. Read more
items.author: C. M.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress to small, bought 1 size bigger then chart shows, still to small. Daughter cried.
items.body: The dress is gorgeous and the cor is amazing. The size was not what I expected. I read the reviews and even bought 1 size bigger for my daughter so she can wear more then 1 time. Got the dress, it is to small and short in the front. She is so upset that the size did not fit. Read more
items.author: betty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: Super cute!! True to size. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Red, Navy, Pink, White, Blue, Burgundy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
